sources.title: Friday the 13th (1953)
sources.description: Friday the 13th is a Terrytoons cartoon directed by Mannie Davis. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/friday-the-13th-1953/

metadata.Plot: Percy the Cat informs Little Roquefort the Mouse that it is Friday the 13th and the day will involve a lot of bad luck for Roquefort. Percy then proves his statemnet by making life miserable for the mouse. But Percy breaks a mirror and the tables are turned.
metadata.Writer: Tom Morrison, Bob Kuwahara, Paul Terry
